name: Follow The Line Zen
description:
Welcome to Follow The Line Zen.

Touch and Drag on the screen to move object. Keep your finger on the screen, stay inside the line and walk through randomly generated path. Don't let vicious obstacles get in your way and beat your friends' high scores. You use friendly green shapes to your advantage -- but be careful -- because sometimes they can get in the way!

FEATURES
● Over 100 mazes available
● Leaderboards integration
● Share Social

Easy to learn and difficult to put down. Download the The Line Zen today and enter the zone.

How to play:

Playing Follow The Line Zen is simple. Touch anywhere on the screen and drag left or right to move the ball. Avoid the red tiles or your character will explode and the game will be over!

FOLLOW
https://www.facebook.com/StudioGameFree

Thank you so much.
